齊.definition: neat; even; level with; identical; simultaneous; all together; to even sth out

齊人之福.definition: lit. the happy fate of the man from Qi (who had a wife and a concubine) (idiom); fig. (ironically) the joy of having several partners; the life of a pasha

齊內丁·齊達內.pinyin: qí nèi dīng · qí dá nèi
齊內丁·齊達內.definition: Zinedine Zidane (Zizou), a past French soccer player

齊國.definition: Qi state of Western Zhou and the Warring states (1122-265 BC), centered in Shandong

齊大非偶.definition: too rich to be a good match (in marriage) (idiom)

齊大非耦.definition: variant of 齊大非偶|齐大非偶[qi2 da4 fei1 ou3]

齊天大聖.definition: Great Sage the Equal of Heaven, self-proclaimed title of the Monkey King Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1] in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]

齊家.definition: to govern one's family; to manage one's household

齊家文化.definition: Qijia neolithic culture, centered around the Gansu Corridor 河西走廊[He2 xi1 Zou3 lang2] c. 2000 BC

齊家治國.definition: to regulate the family and rule the state (idiom)

齊心.definition: to be of one mind; to work as one

齊心協力.definition: to work with a common purpose (idiom); to make concerted efforts; to pull together; to work as one

齊心合力.definition: to work as one (idiom); united in a concerted effort; working hard together

齊打夯兒地.definition: in unison and with one voice (dialect)

齊書.definition: History of Qi of the Southern Dynasties, seventh of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled by Xiao Zixian 蕭子顯|萧子显[Xiao1 Zi3 xian3] in 537 during Liang of the Southern Dynasties 南朝梁[Nan2 chao2 Liang2], 59 scrolls; usually 南齊書|南齐书[Nan2 Qi2 shu1] to distinguish from Northern Qi

齊柏林.definition: Zeppelin (name); Graf Ferdinand von Zeppelin (1838-1917), inventor of the Zeppelin dirigible airship

齊根.definition: at the base; at the root; (of a leg) just below the crutch

齊格菲防線.definition: Siegfried Line, line of German military defenses during WWI and WWII

齊桓公.definition: Duke Huan of Qi (reigned 685-643 BC), one of the Five Hegemons 春秋五霸

齊武成.definition: Emperor Wucheng of Qi, personal name 高湛[Gao1 Dan1] (537-568), reigned 561-565

齊民要術.definition: Essential skill to benefit the people, sixth century encyclopedia of agricultural knowledge by Jia Sixie 賈思勰|贾思勰[Jia3 Si1 xie2]

齊河.definition: Qihe county in Dezhou 德州[De2 zhou1], Shandong

齊河縣.definition: Qihe county in Dezhou 德州[De2 zhou1], Shandong

齊眉.definition: mutual respect in marriage; abbr. of idiom 舉案齊眉|举案齐眉[ju3 an4 qi2 mei2]

齊聚一堂.definition: to get together all at once

齊肩.definition: level with one's shoulders; (of two people) both the same height

齊膝.definition: level with one's knees; knee-length (skirt etc); knee-deep (mud etc)

齊頭.definition: at the same time; simultaneously; (when stating a quantity that is a round number) exactly

齊頭並進.definition: to go forward together (idiom); to undertake simultaneous tasks; going hand in hand

齊頭式.definition: treating everyone the same, regardless of individual differences; one-size-fits-all approach; (typesetting) block paragraphs (no indenting, and blank space between each paragraph)

齊魯.definition: alternative name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]

齊齊哈爾.definition: see 齊齊哈爾市|齐齐哈尔市[Qi2qi2ha1er3 Shi4]

齊齊哈爾市.definition: Qiqihar, prefecture-level city in Heilongjiang Province 黑龍江省|黑龙江省[Hei1long2jiang1 Sheng3]
